ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Community_Treatment_Order_Level_1' && ((5 * FLOOR( ( Order_Expiry_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) + MIN( 5, MOD(Order_Expiry_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * FLOOR( ( Date_Entered__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Date_Entered__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ))+1 > 42,true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid date. Order Expired date can not be more than 42 days from the order entered date
